thread.title: Gem in library district
thread.title_full: Gem in library district - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: plball14
title: Gem in library district
text: This was our first visit to the Library Hotel, but it will not be our last. From the moment we entered we were greeted warmly and treated to professional topnotch service throughout our stay. We enjoyed a spacious junior suite that exceeded our expectations in comfort and style. Our room was furnished with a variety of classic and contemporary biographies; would have loved to stay another day and read in the room or in the homey second floor area. Breakfast snacks and coffee were appreciated in the morning; an ideal arrangement of snacks and wine were perfect for our pre-Broadway evening excursions. The rooftop lounge is an inviting space that we look forward to visiting when we visit in warmer weather.
